```{r}
library(readxl)
df=read_xlsx("C:\\Users\\MATH -276\\Documents\\SCA.xlsx")
df
N=as.matrix(df[,1:5])
rownames=df$RowNames
colmanes=df$ColNames[!is.na(df$ColNames)]
I=nrow(N)
J=ncol(N)
n=sum(N)
P=N/n
r=rowSums(N)
c=colSums(N)
Dr.inv=diag(1/sqrt(r))
Dc.inv=diag(1/sqrt(c))
S=Dr.inv%*%(P-r%*%t(c))%*%Dc.inv


```
